subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Christian Gomez and goalkeeper Mike Graczyk were traded to D.C. United by Colorado for midfielder/defender Ivan Guerrero. Gomez was the 2006 Major League Soccer most valuable player for D.C. United. He had three goals and six assists in 20 games with the Rapids last season.
